candidates.reason: Swarm Consensus (3 votes): groq: As a Bitcoin mining stock, HUT follows crypto cycles and exhibits high volatility, similar to MARA. Its recent price weakness could reverse, making it a good mean reversion candidate.; xai: HUT (Hut 8 Mining) mirrors WULF and MARA as a Bitcoin mining company with intense volatility from crypto exposure and boom/bust cycles. It follows crypto market sentiment, experiencing sharp trends and reversals akin to SOL-USD. With recent weakness (down ~40% over the past 6 months amid regulatory pressures and energy costs), it has meme-like retail interest in crypto narratives, making it a strong mean reversion candidate as Bitcoin halvings historically trigger bounces in mining stocks.
